thread.title: BCB Award Ceremony Set For October 24
thread.title_full: BCB Award Ceremony Set For October 24

author: Chris
title: BCB Award Ceremony Set For October 24
text:
October 21, 2015 | 0 Comments 
The Bermuda Cricket Board [BCB] is getting set to host its 2015 Award Ceremony on Saturday, October 24 at 7.00pm at Goslings Wine Cellar at 9 Dundonald Street. 
With a semi-formal dress code calling for no jeans or sneakers, the event will feature a buffet dinner and cash bar, and music by Jugglin Jason. 
Tickets cost $10 each and are available by contacting the BCB via email at info@cricket.bm or via telephone on 292 8958. Related Stories
